name: Make everyday matter
description: Learn new a topic everyday, contribute to your Github everyday

name: Do not go to war
description: Resist the temptation of augmenting, making threat and personal attack.

name: Calm your emotions
description:
Correct your vision : The other person is not trying to destroy you, he might be in danger of something.
 Focus on your breading : focus on yourself.
 Take the shoot : do not react to the other person.

name: Calm others people emotions
description: Acknowledge what the other is saying, say that you are listening. Show that you want to discuss about it.

name: Understand rather than be understood
description: Ask question, see with his eyes, feel the way he feels.

name: Made him understand that you understood
description: Reformulate his thought, ask if ou are right.

name: Juxtapose your point of view to his rather than oppose it
description: Do not use the word 'but' instead use 'and'.

name: Propose a solution
description: If a win-win solution appears propose it, if not may be a compromise could be possible.
